features: Fits most 37-82 Inch TVs：Please verify TV VESA (the mounting hole patterns of tv back) within 200*100mm to 600*400mm and TV less than weight 132lbs. Up to 24 inch wood stud spacing.
Reduce Glare: -9º tilt Angle adjustment helps to prevent reflections and glare.
Saving Space: TV wall mount frees up so much floor space when your TV is on the wall.（TV back 1.3" away from the wall.）

Easy Installation: Mounting Template made layout easy and Package comes with all hardware needed. (User manual/videos help you install easily) Warm tips: If you need 10X50mm concrete anchors, please let us know to get it.
US-Based Customer Service: Buy with confidence, we provide 10-year after-sales service. Not sure this mount will work?? Please let us know the Complete TV models.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: More for Your Choice TV Mount for 26"-60" TVs Add to Cart TV Mount for 42"-86" TVs Add to Cart Universal Soundbar Mount Add to Cart TV Mount for 32"-70" TVs Add to Cart TV Mount for 26"-60" TVs Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.7 out of 5 stars 832 4.7 out of 5 stars 614 4.5 out of 5 stars 435 4.7 out of 5 stars 722 4.7 out of 5 stars 339 Price $17.99$17.99 $54.99$54.99 $29.99$29.99 $47.99$47.99 $16.99$16.99 Move Type Tilt Full Motion Soundbar Mount Full Motion Fixed TV Size 26"-60" 42"-86" / 32"-70" 26"-60" Max Load 99lbs 132lbs 13lbs 110lbs 99lbs Max VESA 400x400mm 600x400mm 600x400mm 400x400mm 400x400mm Tilt Angle -9° +5°/-15° / +5°/-15° / Swivel Angle / ±45° / ±45° / Extend / 15.18" 3.4"-6.06" 3.34"-15.07" / Fit Studs Spacing Up to 16" Up to 16" Up to 24" Up to 16" Up to 16"

How can I check if the TV mount is suitable for my TV? 1 Weight up to 132 LBS 2 VESA pattern, max 600x400mm, min 200x100mm 3 Wall Types : Up to 24‘’ wood wtuds and solid brick/concrete wall. How to configure VESA holes? VESA= horizontal x vertical distance (the four holes on the back of the TV) What kinds of wall type can the tv mount be mounted on? 8‘’-24‘’ Wood studs and solid brick and concrete wall.（DO NOT MOUNT ON DRYWALL ALONE） Are screws included? All standard mounting hardware included(TV Screws, Spacers, Washers, Lag bolt, Allen key), bubble level and clear instruction, easy installation. The concrete anchors are send per request, size 10x50mm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect mount for our tv
reviews.reviewText: Worked perfectly for our 65" tv. Was easily installed and hung on my own. Gave tv that perfect angle for viewing. Would definitely buy again. The price was very reasonable for this wall mount bracket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High-quality hardware and instructions!
reviews.reviewText: These days I don't expect too much from Chinese products when it comes to instructions and/or user's manuals, so I was *very* pleasantly surprised with this TV mounting kit. Great fold-out instructions with clear details in an easy to follow layout. (I only spotted one grammar issue, but it didn't cause any confusion at all.) As for the kit itself, all the necessary hardware for various home mounting scenarios was included, and this is a very sturdy product. I stud mounted our 70" Samsung TV in less than 20 minutes using a stud finder and drill driver. Excellent experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TV Wall Mount that Gets the Job Done, sturdy, and quick to install.
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy Wall Mount is quick and easy to install. Well built and includes all mounting hardware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Supports 75" Hisense U7K
reviews.reviewText: As the headline states, I bought this for my new office TV, a 75" Hisense U7K, and it works well. It doesn't seem as solidly built as a lot of my older mounts, but flat TVs have gotten a LOT lighter over the years, so thicker metal probably isn't as important as it used to be. I will confirm that it seems to be able to be placed on 24" on-center studs, if needed, but I mounted it on 16" on-center studs. Once the TV was mounted on the frame, I was able to easily slide the TV from left to right several inches to center it on the wall.The only nitpick was that because of the 400 x 400 Vesa mounting holes on the TV, I didn't have any up/down alignment options, which just required some simple measuring for accurate wall placement. Additionally, because of the required 400 x 400 low mount placement, the bottom hooks' release straps hung below the TV, but I just pulled them toward each other and ziptied them together, and now they can't be seen and I can also pull them both down simultaneously with one hand to release the bottom hooks.Because of the narrow area where I mounted the TV, I didn't need side-to-side articulation of the mount, but thought I might need options for tilt angle adjustment. It turns out that it looked best to me at its chosen height, in my particular space, at a completely flat angle, so tilt angle adjustment was a non-issue. But, as a note, adjusting the tilt angle of the mount, which I didn't actually do, absolutely requires either choosing and locking the angle into place before mounting the TV to the frame, or taking the TV back down to adjust after initial mounting. I've had other mounts which allowed me to adjust the tilt angle while the TV was still mounted by using locking spring-loaded pins on both sides, which is definitely preferable. Additionally, the way the angle is set and locked into place is by tightening two screws on each side into two rounded available slots on each side (so four total screws in four total slots, with two screws facing inward and two screws facing outward). And, without any way to lock them into place besides screw tension, it doesn't seem like the most solid, accurate, or long-lasting way to do it. But, for me, who just needed a cheap, flat mount without any side-to-side articulation or tilt angle adjustment, this mount worked perfectly well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked out great
reviews.reviewText: It’s a simple mount, nothing too fancy. I love that I can tilt it if I want to but ultimately I just wanted it mounted straight on the wall and it got the job done just perfectly. Was t hard to I stall and it even comes with a template so you can measure, mark and put the bolts exactly where you need them. Takes the guess work out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Used for an LG C65 - nothing fancy, but a sturdy wall mount that allows sliding to better position when using studs (best way for most). Tilting is very limited, but useful for final position where window glare may be an issue. For the price, would be hard to beat. As with all surface wall mounts, it does make the TV not flush to the wall. For safety, two people are needed for final lift of TV to mount. Again, quality and price is excellent.
